front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for the DS0 and DS0 Bundle Interface Type

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes objects used for managing DS0 and DS0 Bundle interfaces. This document is a companion document with Definitions of Managed Objects for the DS1/E1/DS2/E2 (RFC 2495 ), DS3/E3 (RFC 2496 ), and the work in progress, SONET/SDH Interface Types.
This memo specifies a MIB module in a manner that is both compliant to the SNMPv2 SMI, and semantically identical to the peer SNMPv1 definitions.
